task_description: i need to prepeare dinner for 10 people

items.summary: Plan Italian menu for 10 people including 2 vegetarians and 1 vegan
items.detail: Focus on Italian dishes with suitable alternatives for dietary needs
List all ingredients needed based on the menu, including quantities multiplied for 10 servings.
Shop for all items on the list, checking for freshness and quality.
Chop, measure, and organize ingredients as per recipes; this can be done in advance where possible.
Follow recipes to prepare each component, timing to ensure everything is hot when served.
Arrange tableware, utensils, and serving dishes for 10 guests.
Plan schedule for all steps to align with serving dinner at 5pm Saturday
